top: Trading on the Tokyo Stock Exchange was suspended Thursday because of a problem in the system for relaying market information.
The Tokyo Stock Exchange said that all trading was stopped because of the problem, and will not resume for the rest of the day.
(Reuters) - Trading on the Tokyo Stock Exchange was brought to a complete standstill by a hardware failure for all of Thursday, in the worst-ever outage for the world’s third-largest equity market.
